price: Such are the comparisons We set forth for people, but none will understand them except the people of knowledge.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِۖ وَمَا يَعۡقِلُهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡعَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-amthālu naḍribuhā lilnnāsi wamā yaʿqiluhā illā al-ʿālimūna
